overview: Non-Human Whispers is an ongoing experiment seeking to answer an impossible question: can things speak their piece or are they forever bound to what we humans say for them? How can the camera —the object mimicking the human gaze— betray our intentions to form a secret alliance with these seemingly mute subjects? The tension arising from these unanswerable questions drives this ontological telenovela.
title: Non-Human Whispers, Episode 2
